remarks: The sum of two group sums expressed as mappings.  (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 9-Jul-2019.)
statement:
gsummptfsadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsummptfsadd.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsummptfsadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsummptfsadd.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsummptfsadd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsummptfsadd.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. B ) $.
gsummptfsadd.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> D e. B ) $.
gsummptfsadd.f $e |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. A |-> C ) ) $.
gsummptfsadd.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( x e. A |-> D ) ) $.
gsummptfsadd.w $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsummptfsadd.v $e |- ( ph -> H finSupp .0. ) $.
gsummptfsadd $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( x e. A |-> ( C .+ D ) ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .+ ( G gsum H ) ) ) $.
$d .+ x $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
